mapper.sql: wh_id, wh_name, is_effective, (select name from TB_SYS_LOOKUP where type = 'WH_EFFECTIVE' and code = a.is_effective) is_effective_name, wh_type, (select name from TB_SYS_LOOKUP where type = 'WH_TYPE' and code = a.wh_type) wh_type_name, wh_attribute, (select name from TB_SYS_LOOKUP where type = 'WH_ATTR' and code = a.wh_attribute) wh_attribute_name, domain, (select name from TB_ORG_DOMAIN where id = a.domain) domain_name, dept_id, (select dept_name from TB_ORG_DEPT where dept_id = a.dept_id) dept_name, assigned_name, (select chn_nm from TB_AUTH_PERSONNEL where psn_id = a.assigned_name) assigned_dscr, co_vat_no, (select co_name from TB_COM_COMPANY where co_vat_no = a.co_vat_no) co_name, fax_nbr, wh_email, contact_address, zip, city, area, village, adject, road, lane, alley, sub_alley, door_no, door_no_ex, floor, floor_ex, room, add_other, contact1, contact1_nbr1, contact1_nbr2, contact2, contact2_nbr, memo, failure_date, failure_resn, failure_resn_desc, cr_user, cr_time, md_user, md_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_INV_WAREHOUSE a
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_INV_WAREHOUSE (wh_id, wh_name, is_effective, wh_type, wh_attribute, domain, dept_id, assigned_name, co_vat_no, fax_nbr, wh_email, contact_address, zip, city, area, village, adject, road, lane, alley, sub_alley, door_no, door_no_ex, floor, floor_ex, room, add_other, contact1, contact1_nbr1, contact1_nbr2, contact2, contact2_nbr, memo, failure_date, failure_resn, failure_resn_desc, cr_user, cr_time, md_user, md_time ) values (#{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wh_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_effective,jdbcType=BIT}, #{wh_type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{wh_attribute,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assigned_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{co_vat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax_nbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wh_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{road,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lane,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alley,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sub_alley,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{door_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{door_no_ex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floor_ex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{add_other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact1_nbr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact1_nbr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact2_nbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failure_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{failure_resn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failure_resn_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.select: SELECT * from TB_INV_WAREHOUSE where is_effective='1' order by wh_id

SELECT domain, wh_id, wh_type, wh_attribute, wh_name, is_effective, dept_id, assigned_name, co_vat_no, fax_nbr, wh_email, contact_address, zip, city, area, village, adject, road, lane, alley, sub_alley, door_no, door_no_ex, floor, floor_ex, room, add_other, contact1, contact1_nbr1, contact1_nbr2, contact2, contact2_nbr, memo, failure_date, failure_resn, failure_resn_desc from TB_INV_WAREHOUSE where is_effective=1 order by wh_id
SELECT * from TB_INV_WAREHOUSE where domain =(select domain from TB_ORG_DEPT where dept_id= #{deptId}) and is_effective='1'
